mapper.select: select id,class_name as text ,parent_id as parentId,level from shop_goods_class

SELECT s.class_name AS className, s.parent_id AS parentId, s.goods_type_id AS goodsTypeId, s.display, s.recommend, s.icon_type AS iconType, s.icon_sys AS iconSys, s.seo_keywords AS seoKeywords, s.seo_description AS seoDescription, s.id, s.sort, t.name, s2.class_name AS parentName, s2.level as parentLevel FROM shop_goods_class s LEFT JOIN shop_goods_type t ON s.goods_type_id = t.id LEFT JOIN shop_goods_class s2 ON s.parent_id = s2.id where s.id = #{id}
